name: Chetris (itch)
description:
Chetris is a chess-based puzzler where you must use take the enemy king in each level. The twist is that you only have one piece, and each time you move it will change into a different piece.

This game is playable on mobile devices but on weaker devices players may notice that the audio stutters.

Music by Eric Matyas at www.soundimage.org

Pixel art by Silverm at www.silverm.itch.io
